answers.answer: I am on my first pregnancy so I have no help or advice for you however I am good for encouragement. You can do this. Just think after 9 months you will get to hold your bundle of joy in your arms. It will make everything worth it. What a wonderful surprise too! The surprise of life! A great blessing. I hope his helps. I will be praying for you. Good luck :)

question: I recently found out im prego again. I have a 6 and 2yr old and this one is a suprise... im terrified to go through the preeclampsia again along with the c-sec. Basically im requesting help/advice/assurement. :(
title: 3rd times a charm right?
